alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:30AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Dawson and Wibaux Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Expect reduced visibility in moderate snow. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
